lead_paragraph: The Denver Nuggets traded guard-forward Ruben Patterson to the Milwaukee Bucks yesterday for forward Joe Smith. The top overall pick of the Warriors in 1995, Smith averaged 8.6 points and 5.2 rebounds in 44 games for the Bucks last season. Patterson averaged 13.2 points and 3.5 rebounds in 26 games with the Nuggets.
